item.title: Draw More Work Less
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Some Links from leesei Text based tools GUI Tools Some Links UML | leesei’s notebook Draw More, Work Less | [self employed] Draw More, Work Less PlantUML Mermaid from leesei Unified Modeling Language (UML) Business Process Model and Notation (BPMN) is very similar to activity diagram. YANG Central Allen Holub’s UML Quick Reference Text based tools I used to use the GUI tool Dia. But it was very buggy and no longer updated.
